sentences.en: Abdiel decides not to join Satan's army and returns to God.
sentences.cn: 阿比迪决定不加入撒旦的阵营重返上帝的身边.

sentences.en: And Satan tells our generation that the Bible is not true.
sentences.cn: 撒但对现今的世代说圣经不是真确的.

sentences.en: As soon as Judas took the bread , Satan entered into him.
sentences.cn: 他吃了以后, 撒但就入了他的心. 耶稣对他说,你所作的快作吧.

sentences.en: Believe Satan says the same at the gates of hell, old - timer!
sentences.cn: 相信撒旦在地狱之门也说同样的话, 老顽固!

sentences.en: But what distinguished the physician's ecstasy from Satan's was the trait of wonder in it!
sentences.cn: 不过,那医生的狂喜同撒旦的区别在于,其中尚有惊奇的成分!

sentences.en: Call in Beelzebub to cast out Satan.
sentences.cn: 叫魔王赶撒旦;召鬼驱鬼.

sentences.en: He replied, " I saw Satan fall like lightning from heaven. "
sentences.cn: 耶稣就对他们说 、 我曾看见撒但从天上坠落、像闪电一样.

sentences.en: If it convicts, then it is from God, but if it condemns then it is from Satan.
sentences.cn: 如果这是定罪，那么它就是来自于上帝；如果是谴责，这就是来自撒旦。

sentences.en: In Milton's poem, Satan, even after his fall, dimly reflects his former glory.
sentences.cn: 在弥尔顿的诗中, 撒旦即便失败后, 也能依稀显出昔日的荣光.

sentences.en: Satan attempts to imitate this in the occult by making us feel special, as we are part of a secretive, hidden realm.
sentences.cn: 撒旦企图仿效这个秘密让我们感觉到特别，如同我们是秘密的一部分，隐藏在他的领域里。

sentences.en: Satan dropped it there, I take it, intending a scurrilous jest against your reverence.
sentences.cn: 我想, 准是撒旦丢在那儿, 有意中伤阁下您的.

sentences.en: Satan or the Red Dragon is under God's control for 1,000 years.
sentences.cn: 红龙,也就是撒旦,被困在神的控制下一千年.

sentences.en: Satan uses this secret aspect of the occult to weave his deception.
sentences.cn: 撒旦用这个秘密装出神秘的样子来编织它的骗术。

sentences.en: Satan, sin, self, darkness, and worldliness predominate among all people on earth.
sentences.cn: 撒但 、 罪 、 己 、 黑暗和属地事物,辖制了全地的人.

sentences.en: Simon, Simon, Satan has asked to sift you as wheat.
sentences.cn: 主又说,西门, 西门, 撒但想要得着你们,好筛你们,像筛麦子一样.

sentences.en: The cross was the power that conquered Satan and sin.
sentences.cn: 十字架就是征服撒但和罪恶的权能.

sentences.en: The name of Satan himself did not frighten her half so much.
sentences.cn: 连撒旦本人也不会像他这样叫人害怕呢!

sentences.en: Who else would brag about meeting Satan halfway?
sentences.cn: 谁还会吹嘘他在半路上见到了撒旦?

trans.tran_en: the Devil, considered to be the main evil power and God’s opponent
